remarks: Lemma for Exercise 44 version of Theorem 3Q of [Enderton] p. 60.  The third hypothesis is the compatibility assumption.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)
statement:
th3qlem1.1 $e |- .~ Er S $.
th3qlem1.3 $e |- ( ( ( y e. S /\ w e. S ) /\ ( z e. S /\ v e. S ) ) -> ( ( y .~ w /\ z .~ v ) -> ( y .+ z ) .~ ( w .+ v ) ) ) $.
th3qlem1 $p |- ( ( A e. ( S /. .~ ) /\ B e. ( S /. .~ ) ) -> E* x E. y E. z ( ( A = [ y ] .~ /\ B = [ z ] .~ ) /\ x = [ ( y .+ z ) ] .~ ) ) $.
$d .+ v w x y z $.
$d .~ v w x y z $.
$d A v w x y z $.
$d B v w x y z $.
$d S v w x y z $.
